name: Love, Kyoko
description:
Help Kyoko defend her lab in this cute rogue-like! Control randomized Mechs to defend against attacking monsters, and unleash special attacks to DESTROY THEM ALL. Read up on enemies using the Notebook, but be careful not to run out of fuel! Simple controls, with a little RNG. Written in pure Batch.

Features

  • 7 unique Mechs
  • 6 evil Monsters
  • Randomly Generated Levels
  • Weird, dreamy ASCII art
  • High scores

note : this game is still in development, so many elements are not set in stone, as well as the monsters & mechs.
